brother’s wife (male ego): kakîː namâː, pʰǒːneː namâː, kakâː lah jodpí áɕeː
brother’s wife (female ego): mĩːmwêː namâː, kakîː namâː, kakâː lah jodpí áɕeː
sister’s husband (male ego): áɕeː jodpí kakâː, strĩːmó jodpí maqpá
sister’s husband (female ego): áɕeː jodpí kakâː, núŋo jodpí mĩːmó
husband’s brother: aɕí pubí kakâː, aɕí pubí pʰǒːno
husband’s sister: aɕí pubí áɕeː, aɕí pubí strĩːmó
husband’s brother’s wife: aɕí pubí pʰǒːneː namâː, kakîː namâː, namâː reːrêː
father’s sister’s son: nêːne buː, môːmo nêːne reːrêː pʰǒːno, d͡ʑã́mo nêːne reːrêː pʰǒːno, d͡ʑã́mo nêːne reːrêː mĩːmó
father’s sister’s daughter: nêːne boŋó, môːmo nêːne reːrêː strĩːmó, môːmo nêːne reːrêː áɕeː, môːmo nêːne reːrêː núŋo
mother’s brother’s son: môːmweː bûː, môːmo nêːne reːrêː pʰǒːno, d͡ʑã́mo nêːne reːrêː pʰǒːno, d͡ʑã́mo nêːne reːrêː mĩːmó
mother’s brother’s daughter: môːmweː boŋó, môːmo nêːne reːrêː strĩːmó, môːmo nêːne reːrêː áɕeː núŋo
mother’s sister’s son: mat͡ɕúŋiː bûː, mat͡ɕúŋ reːrêː pʰǒːno, mat͡ɕúŋ reːrêː mĩːmó
mother’s sister’s daughter: mat͡ɕúŋiː boŋó, mat͡ɕúŋ reːrêː strĩːmó, mat͡ɕúŋ reːrêː áɕeː núŋo
halfsister (same father, different mothe: áta t͡ɕíkpi strĩːmó, áta t͡ɕíkpi áɕeː núŋo
halfbrother (same father, different moth: áta t͡ɕíkpi pʰǒːno, áta t͡ɕíkpi mĩːmó
halfsister (same mother, different fathe: áŋo t͡ɕíkpi strĩːmó, áŋo t͡ɕíkpi áɕeː núŋo
halfbrother (same mother, different fath: áŋo t͡ɕíkpi pʰǒːno, áŋo t͡ɕíkpi mĩːmó

mother’s father: mən nɑːn nɑː tɑː, tɑːi kata
mother’s mother: mən nɑːn nɑː nɑːn, nɑːni kata
father’s older brother’s wife: ama, tɑːt nɑː vru kuːt͡ʃ kata
father’s younger brother’s wife: ama, tɑː nɑː vru kuːt͡ʃ t͡ʃət
brother’s wife (female ego): janga kuːt͡ʃ, janga kuːt͡ʃ nɑː vru kuːt͡ʃ
stepbrother (no shared parent): iχɑːi na t͡sa nɑːn zafuwi na
halfsister (same father, different mothe: iχɑːi za t͡sa tɑː wɑːki t͡sa nɑːn d͡ʒədɑː
halfbrother (same father, different moth: vruwi za t͡sa tɑː wɑːki t͡sa nɑːn d͡ʒədɑː
halfsister (same mother, different fathe: iχɑːi za t͡sa nɑːn wɑːki t͡sa tɑː d͡ʒədɑː
halfbrother (same mother, different fath: vrɑːjiki t͡sa nɑːn wɑːki t͡sa nɑːn tɑː d͡ʒədɑː

brother’s son: orth: bɻaː guːɽ, audio: bɻoː ɻu
stepsister (no shared parent): jari nu stə ware moːtoː d͡ʒuk
stepbrother (no shared parent): jari nu stə ware moːtoː aːɽiː

stepsister (no shared parent): jari nuː stə war mɑːt͡ʃi taː d͡ʒuk
stepbrother (no shared parent): jari nuː stə war mɑːt͡ʃi taː məɽə

halfsister (same father, different mothe: ʒə tɑːtan qatiː ʒə neːnin d͡ʒədɑː
halfsister (same mother, different fathe: ʒə neːnin juː ʒə tɑːtan d͡ʒədɑː
halfbrother (same mother, different fath: ʒə neːnin qatiː ʒə tɑːtan d͡ʒədɑː

father’s older brother’s wife: məʃər kaːk maːʃiː, ɑːli mambat͡sa? maːʃiː
father’s younger brother’s wife: kəʃər kaːka maːʃiː, kaneʃʈi kaːk maːʃiː, saɽaːki mambat͡sa maːʃiː
head of tribe: χɑːm məʃər, wanɖi məʃər, gruː məʃər, sargurub

father’s sister’s husband: mumik kəs poːzə, baːwas sawaːstoː poːzə
